details:
A Secunia Advisory reports:

> fsplib can be exploited to compromise an application using
> the library.
>
> A boundary error exists in the processing of file names in
> fsp\_readdir\_native, which can be exploited to cause a stack-based
> buffer overflow if the defined MAXNAMLEN is bigger than 256.
>
> A boundary error exists in the processing of directory entries in
> fsp\_readdir, which can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer
> overflow on systems with an insufficient size allocated for the
> d\_name field of directory entries.
